non_compliant.section: NOTHING HEREIN INTENDS TO EXCLUDE OR LIMIT ANY LIABILITY FARADAY IS SUBJECT TO UNDER THE MANDATORY APPLICABLE LAW.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Requirement for clear and plain language; Transparency principle
non_compliant.amend: Rephrase to be more specific and user-friendly, clearly outlining Faraday's potential liabilities.

non_compliant.section:
15. NO THIRD-PARTY BENEFICIARIES
You agree that, except as otherwise expressly provided in this T&Cs, there shall be no third-party beneficiaries to this agreement.
non_compliant.amend: This section is generally acceptable under GDPR, but its relevance to data protection is unclear. Consider removing or clarifying its purpose in the context of data processing.

non_compliant.section:
16. TRADEMARK INFORMATION
You agree that all of Faradayâ€™s trademarks, trade names, service marks and other Faraday logos and brand features, and product and service names, are trademarks and the property of Faraday (the "Faraday Marks").
non_compliant.amend: This section is not directly related to data protection and can be placed in a separate intellectual property agreement.
